name: SnowEmergency
0:
”Alexa, ask Snow Emergency what's up with Saint Paul”
”Alexa, ask Snow Emergency if there's one in Minneapolis”
”Alexa, ask Snow Emergency to tell me about Brooklyn Park”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snow emergency
des: Snow Emergency provides snow emergency status (when available) for select Minnesota cities. For cities that don't explicitly declare snow emergencies, this app will tell you the amount of snowfall that triggers a snow emergency for that city.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
